insert into gd_productmanage (imgURL, title, introduce, price, remarks, option_tm, `rank`, basic_version, detailsImgUrl, `label`, module_version, notesToBuy, sys_type, baiduyun) values (#{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{basicVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailsimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notestobuy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baiduyun,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update gd_productmanage set imgURL = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_tm = #{optionTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `rank` = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, basic_version = #{basicVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailsImgUrl = #{detailsimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `label` = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_version = #{moduleVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notesToBuy = #{notestobuy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_type = #{sysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baiduyun = #{baiduyun,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, imgURL, title, introduce, price, remarks, option_tm, `rank`, basic_version, detailsImgUrl, `label`, module_version, notesToBuy, sys_type, baiduyun from gd_productmanage where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
